titleStmt.title: An answer to Clemens Alexandrinus's sermon upon Quis dives salvetur? What rich man can be sav'd? Proving it easie for a camel to go through the eye of a needle.
titleStmt.author: Clement, of Alexandria, Saint, ca. 150-ca. 215. Quis dives salvetur?

notesStmt.note: "Deliver'd at the Devil's Arse of Peak."
Imperfect: cropped, with loss of text.
